title: Mimikou
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Est. 1969, this udon restaurant has a separate English vegetarian menu. Location is at Japan, 〒605-0074 京都府京都市 東山区祇園町南側５２８−６. The menu explains that the vegetarian udon is not made with dashi, the Japanese traditional soup made of kelp and fish. There are four different options. Last order 8pm.
